name: Cirnowball Rampage
description:
Made for Touhou Jam 10.

Cirno rolled herself up into a snowball! Help her roll up the residents of Gensokyo with her!

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Left click or Space to tackle in the direction you're moving.

Tackle your enemies to add them to the snowball and restore health.

Dodge bullets to keep your snowball intact!

Credits:

Character Art: Pleinair

Music Composition: WordedPuppet

Background/UI Art: Vicias

Programming: Muvseru
